name: Root Out
description:
Description:

Play as mischievous stemlings to hide your precious trinkets while searching for other players' valuables...
Enjoy puzzle based action with friends in this 3D stylized multiplayer hide-and-seek prop game!

Game premise:
Players hide their props, other players find the hidden props.
Finding props fast and having yours hidden for a long time increases your score!

Game Controls:
WASD- Walk
Shift (hold)- Sprint
Left Click- Place prop/Pickup prop

How to play:
Extract game folder.
Run executable.
One player host's a game, other people connect to the host.

To Host:
The host needs to port forward! At the home screen, type in the PORT you wish to open on then hit "Host Festival". At the lobby menu, you can press the "Get IP" leaf to get your public IP that the clients can you you at (the bottom IP).

To Join:
At the home screen, type in the IP:PORT you wish to connect to and hit "Join Festival".

!!!!!NOTE!!!!!:
This is a game jam and and has low fidelity as such. If you hit the connect button and fail to connect, RESTART YOUR GAME. Don't connect to a game that is already started; if the game leaves the lobby,
THE HOST HAS TO RESTART THE GAME.
